title: 求助~第二个人上服务器后就崩溃
author: cupzdz
txt_content:
服务器1.7.2装了NPC MOD的和一个食物MOD 前些天几个朋友一起玩都没问题 今天开始一个人上线没事 第二个人一上线服务器就会崩溃~求解，谢谢大家
[14:51:31] [Server thread/ERROR]: Encountered an unexpected exception
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
    at java.util.ArrayList.elementData(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_51]
    at java.util.ArrayList.get(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_51]
    at net.minecraft.server.management.ServerConfigurationManager.func_72374_b(ServerConfigurationManager.java:1280) ~[ld.class:?]
    at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:971) ~[MinecraftServer.class:?]
    at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:419) ~[lj.class:?]
    at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:797) ~[MinecraftServer.class:?]
    at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:661) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.7.0_51]
[14:51:31] [Server thread/ERROR]: This crash report has been saved to: D:\1.7.2\.\crash-reports\crash-2014-03-27_14.51.31-server.txt

replies.author: 爱拍孤单-笔记本
replies.txt_content:
你是不是水龙头服务端或者MCPC+服务端
解决方法：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-255905-1-1.html

replies.author: 爱拍孤单-笔记本
replies.txt_content:
爱拍孤单-笔记本 发表于 2014-3-27 15:09
你是不是水龙头服务端或者MCPC+服务端
解决方法：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-255905-1-1.html ...
话说这个问题你们都不会看置顶吗？
